Handcrafted, home-made masterpieces

Premium Materials

Our amigurumis use the best yarn which is sourced locally. This will increase the longevity of your purchase.

Fast Shipping

We make sure you recieve your amigurumi as soon as we have finished making it. We also provide free returns if you are not satisfied.

Quality Assurance

For every purchase you make, we will ensure there are no damages or faults and we will check and test the pitch of your gentle friend.
